What are the treatments for Opitz G/BBB syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Opitz G/BBB syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: 22q11.2 Deletion Syndrome  - Gene Review: Gene Review: X-Linked Opitz G/BBB Syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Opitz G/BBB syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Opitz-Frias syndrome  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Hypospadias  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Imperf
